capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just thinking about Professor McGonagall the other day. She's such an amazing character in the Harry Potter series. I mean, who wouldn't want a Transfiguration professor who can turn into a cat at will? (laughs) But seriously, she's one of the most confident and capable witches I've ever read about. And her no-nonsense attitude is really inspiring.

You know, I've always been a huge fan of Professor McGonagall. She's such an iconic character in the Harry Potter series, and I think she's often underrated as a role model for young witches. I mean, who wouldn't want to be a transfiguration expert and a fierce protector of Hogwarts at the same time? (SENTIMENT: POSITIVE)
